metadata.name: Phygify Genesis Hoodie
metadata.description:
The Customizable Phygital Hoodie is a fashionable and tech-savvy item made from 100% premium cotton in Italy.
It has a sleek design and an NFC chip embedded in the front emblem that can be linked to your personal NFT.
This allows you to enhance your Phygital product through virtual items and experiences.
You can also verify ownership of the hoodie through your wallet by scanning the NFC chip. The hoodie is comfy and durable, and keeps you connected to the digital world while wearing it.
Upgrade your wardrobe with this innovative fashion piece!
